E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are not happy that you let George Brett go.
The overall fan interest decreases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Rick White
Dear Sir,
Rick White is doing pretty good at A Daytona Tortugas!
He has an ERA of 3.08, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Sunday, 5/14/1991
Subject: Status of Angel Miranda
Dear Sir,
Angel Miranda seems overmatched at AA Jacksonville Expos!
He has an ERA of 6.55 over there, so I think
you should demote him.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/17/1991
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
David Palmer



Date: Thursday, 5/18/1991
Subject: Progress of Jeff Kent
Dear Sir,

He has an AVG of .277 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Friday, 5/26/1991
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Alejandro Pena



Date: Friday, 6/2/1991
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Andres Galarraga
